headline: Newest S&P 500 Stock Is Index's Biggest Winner In 2025
summary: The S&P 500 index is right at record highs, with 28 components up at least 50% in 2025. Robinhood Markets, Seagate Technology, Western Digital, Palantir Technologies, Newmont, AppLovin and Micron Technology are top-performing S&P 500 stocks this year, with all but Micron stock boasting triple-digit gains.

headline: Western Digital (WDC) Sees Price Target Raised Amid Strong AI, Data Center Demand

(NASDAQ:WDC) to $115 from $85 on September 16, retaining a Buy rating on the company’s shares. According to Benchmark, the hike is a result of extended lead times for high-capacity drives, which […]

headline: Western Digital stock surges: A closer look at the record climb
summary: Western Digital (WDC) stock has more than doubled since the start of 2025, hitting record highs as Wall Street analysts raise their price targets for the stock. Rosenblatt Securities managing director and senior research analyst Kevin Cassidy explains why he made a bullish call for the company and shares his outlook for the stock and other names in the space, like Seagate (STX). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: Western Digital stock surges: A closer look at the record climb
content.description:
Western Digital (WDC) stock has more than doubled since the start of 2025, hitting record highs as Wall Street analysts raise their price targets for the stock.

Rosenblatt Securities managing director and senior research analyst Kevin Cassidy explains why he made a bullish call for the company and shares his outlook for the stock and other names in the space, like Seagate (STX).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Why Is Western Digital (WDC) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of leading data storage manufacturer Western Digital (NASDAQ: WDC) jumped 7.6% in the afternoon session after several investment banks, including Morgan Stanley and Rosenblatt Securities, significantly raised their price targets on the stock, citing a strengthening market for hard disk drives (HDDs).

content.title: Why Is Western Digital (WDC) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
content.summary: Shares of leading data storage manufacturer Western Digital (NASDAQ: WDC) jumped 7.6% in the afternoon session after several investment banks, including Morgan Stanley and Rosenblatt Securities, significantly raised their price targets on the stock, citing a strengthening market for hard disk drives (HDDs).

headline: Morgan Stanley materially lifts HDD price targets and forecasts
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley sharply raised its price targets and earnings forecasts for Western Digital and Seagate Technology, arguing that the hard disk drive (HDD) market has entered a “Stronger for Longer” cycle supported by AI-driven demand and cloud investment.

content.title: Morgan Stanley materially lifts HDD price targets and forecasts
content.summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley sharply raised its price targets and earnings forecasts for Western Digital and Seagate Technology, arguing that the hard disk drive (HDD) market has entered a “Stronger for Longer” cycle supported by AI-driven demand and cloud investment.
